method.name: range_i
method.description:
Generate a random integer between two values.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- var n := SxRand.range_i(1, 2) ----

method.name: range_vec2
method.description:
Generate a random Vector2 between two values for each component.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- var n := SxRand.range_vec2(Vector2.ZERO, Vector2.ONE) ----

method.name: chance_bool
method.description:
Generate a random boolean following a chance percentage (between 0 and 100).
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- # 75% chance! var n := SxRand.chance_bool(75) ----

method.name: choice_array
method.description:
Choose a random value from a non-empty array.
[source,gdscript] .Example ---- var v := SxRand.choice_array([1, 2, 3]) ----
